testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user launch chrome browser............................................passed When user open url "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then page title should be "Dashboard / nopCommerce administration"..........passed When user click on Logout link..............................................passed Then page title should be "Your store. Login"...............................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
